meanings.definition: A person or thing that declines or refuses.
meanings.sent1: She always avoids being the decliners in group activities.
meanings.sent2: The decliners at the meeting chose not to participate.
meanings.sent3: The decliners of the dessert missed out on the delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: The decliners of the invitation regretted not attending the party.
meanings.sent5: The decliners of the challenge lost the opportunity to test their skills.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used to lower or decrease something.
meanings.sent1: The decliners in the factory help control the temperature.
meanings.sent2: The air conditioner is a common decliners in hot weather.
meanings.sent3: The decliners on the treadmill set the speed for the workout.
meanings.sent4: The decliners on the elevator smoothly lower the floors.
meanings.sent5: The decliners on the thermostat adjust the room's warmth.

meanings.definition: A type of financial instrument that decreases in value.
meanings.sent1: Investors closely monitor decliners in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: The economist discussed the impact of decliners on portfolios.
meanings.sent3: The decliners in the market report worried some traders.
meanings.sent4: The sudden decliners in the currency exchange surprised many.
meanings.sent5: The decliners in the bond market affected investment decisions.
